entry.title: Sunday: Near blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 14.
